        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/IOFiltersConfigData.cpp

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/SerialAsciiConfigData.cpp)
        
target_sources(EIPScanner PUBLIC ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_sources(EIPScanner PUBLIC ${SOURCE_FILES})
